# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/standard-http-error`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for standard-http-error (https://github.com/moll/js-standard-http-error).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/standard-http-error.
